title: Baby Driver
description: A talented getaway driver relies on music to stay focused while working for dangerous criminals.

title: Ready Player One
description: A teenager enters a massive virtual reality world to compete for control of its creator’s fortune.

title: Big Hero 6
description: A young robotics prodigy teams up with a lovable robot and friends to stop a mysterious villain.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of astronauts travel through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

title: A Quiet Place
description: A family must live in silence to survive in a world hunted by sound-sensitive creatures.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble one final time to undo the devastation caused by Thanos.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers and their allies attempt to stop Thanos from collecting all six Infinity Stones.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Spider-Man faces the consequences of his identity being revealed across the multiverse.

title: TRON: Legacy
description: A young man is pulled into a digital world where his father has been trapped for decades.

title: Inside Out
description: A young girl’s emotions come to life as they help her navigate a major life change.
